{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Manager",
  "description": "Wig It and Weaves is a luxury hairstyling house devoted to crafting bespoke, unforgettable experiences in an atmosphere of elegance and excellence.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a motivated and experienced Salon Manager to oversee the daily operations of our beauty salon.
	The ideal candidate will be passionate about the beauty industry, have excellent leadership and customer service skills, and be capable of managing a dynamic team of beauty professionals.
	This role is key to ensuring the salon runs efficiently, meets financial targets, and provides a high-quality experience for every client.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications and experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;wigitandweaves01@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Manager Job at Wig It and Weaves




        
    

        
        Wig It and Weaves is a luxury hairstyling house devoted to crafting bespoke, unforgettable experiences in an atmosphere of elegance and excellence.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Manager

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a motivated and experienced Salon Manager to oversee the daily operations of our beauty salon.
	The ideal candidate will be passionate about the beauty industry, have excellent leadership and customer service skills, and be capable of managing a dynamic team of beauty professionals.
	This role is key to ensuring the salon runs efficiently, meets financial targets, and provides a high-quality experience for every client.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications and experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: wigitandweaves01@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business Development Executive",
  "description": "PC Place Nigeria is a leading ICT retail and B2B solutions provider dedicated to delivering top-quality technology products and services across Nigeria. Established with a vision to bridge the gap between people and technology, we specialize in the supply of laptops, desktops, printers, accessories, networking equipment, and enterprise IT solutions to individuals, corporate clients, and institutions nationwide.

With a strong presence in Lagos and a growing footprint across the country, PC Place Nigeria has become a trusted name known for authentic products, competitive pricing, and excellent after-sales support.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview


	We are seeking a motivated and results-driven Business Development Executive to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building relationships with potential clients, and driving sales growth.
	The ideal candidate will possess strong communication skills and a keen understanding of market trends, enabling them to effectively promote our services and solutions.


Key Responsibilities


	Strategic Planning:&nbsp;Developing and implementing business development strategies to achieve sales targets and expand market reach.
	Market Research:&nbsp;Analyzing market trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to identify potential opportunities.
	Sales and Business Development:&nbsp;Generating leads, presenting products and services, negotiating contracts, and closing deals.
	Client Relationship Management:&nbsp;Building and maintaining strong relationships with existing and potential clients, understanding their needs, and providing solutions.
	Collaboration:&nbsp;Working with marketing, product development, and other teams to support business growth and ensure client satisfaction.
	Reporting and Analysis:&nbsp;Preparing sales reports, forecasts, and providing insights to improve business development strategies.


Qualifications


	B.Sc or HND in Business Administration or a related field is desirable.
	Proven experience in business development or sales, preferably within a related industry.
	Demonstrated ability to work independently as well as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
	ICT knowledge is an added advantage.


Skills:


	Sales and Negotiation:&nbsp;Proven ability to sell, negotiate contracts, and close deals.
	Communication:&nbsp;Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively present and articulate product value.
	Market Knowledge:&nbsp;Understanding of ICT industry trends, technologies, and competitive landscape.
	Strategic Thinking:&nbsp;Ability to develop and implement effective business development strategies.
	Relationship Management:&nbsp;Strong interpersonal skills to build and maintain client relationships.
	Analytical Skills:&nbsp;Ability to analyze data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.
	Project Management:&nbsp;Ability to manage multiple projects and ensure timely delivery.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified&nbsp;candidates should send their CV and a Cover Letter to:&nbsp;pcplacenigeria@gmail.com&nbsp;using&nbsp;&quot;Business Development Executive&quot;&nbsp;as the subject of the mail.",
  "datePosted": "2025-09-03",
  "validThrough": "2025-09-11",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "PC Place Nigeria"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",

      "@type": "PostalAddress",

    }
  },

  },

    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",

Business Development Executive Job at PC Place Nigeria




        
    

        
        PC Place Nigeria is a leading ICT retail and B2B solutions provider dedicated to delivering top-quality technology products and services across Nigeria. Established with a vision to bridge the gap between people and technology, we specialize in the supply of laptops, desktops, printers, accessories, networking equipment, and enterprise IT solutions to individuals, corporate clients, and institutions nationwide.

With a strong presence in Lagos and a growing footprint across the country, PC Place Nigeria has become a trusted name known for authentic products, competitive pricing, and excellent after-sales support.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview


	We are seeking a motivated and results-driven Business Development Executive to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building relationships with potential clients, and driving sales growth.
	The ideal candidate will possess strong communication skills and a keen understanding of market trends, enabling them to effectively promote our services and solutions.


Key Responsibilities


	Strategic Planning: Developing and implementing business development strategies to achieve sales targets and expand market reach.
	Market Research: Analyzing market trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to identify potential opportunities.
	Sales and Business Development: Generating leads, presenting products and services, negotiating contracts, and closing deals.
	Client Relationship Management: Building and maintaining strong relationships with existing and potential clients, understanding their needs, and providing solutions.
	Collaboration: Working with marketing, product development, and other teams to support business growth and ensure client satisfaction.
	Reporting and Analysis: Preparing sales reports, forecasts, and providing insights to improve business development strategies.


Qualifications


	B.Sc or HND in Business Administration or a related field is desirable.
	Proven experience in business development or sales, preferably within a related industry.
	Demonstrated ability to work independently as well as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
	ICT knowledge is an added advantage.


Skills:


	Sales and Negotiation: Proven ability to sell, negotiate contracts, and close deals.
	Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively present and articulate product value.
	Market Knowledge: Understanding of ICT industry trends, technologies, and competitive landscape.
	Strategic Thinking: Ability to develop and implement effective business development strategies.
	Relationship Management: Strong interpersonal skills to build and maintain client relationships.
	Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.
	Project Management: Ability to manage multiple projects and ensure timely delivery.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a Cover Letter to: pcplacenigeria@gmail.com using "Business Development Executive" as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Brokers Sales Executive",
  "description": "The Concept Group is a holding company for companies established in 1992. Subsidiaries under the Group include: Rosabon Financial Services - Nigeria&rsquo;s Leading Financial Intermediary and Equipment Leasing Company, Concept Nova - Bespoke Enterprise IT Solutions Company,Percy Aitkins - Bureau De Change.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Brokers Sales Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job&nbsp;Summary


	The Brokers Sales executive uses the customer service and marketing functions to nurture leads through the sales funnel, from the addition of leads on the portal down through purchase (and repeat purchases).
	Brokers use various methods to reach clients, including email, phone, social media, direct mail, and even the old-fashioned door-to-door tactic.
	Brokers&rsquo; sales executives manage, support, and communicate with clients to ensure all leads are effectively managed and their transactions are successfully consummated.
	They are expected to follow up solely with all leads transferred to them, work on all the stages following the set policy and procedures, and ensure all transactions are successfully consummated.
	They communicate all issues encountered during processing stage and feedback from client to the Head Brokers admin for swift resolution.


Duties &amp; Responsibilities


	Acquisition and retention of brokers and clients through offline marketing
	Aggressively following up with all leads referred by brokers and ensuring successful closure of fall leads
	Handles B2B and B2C leads assigned, following all set procedures and ensuring the transaction is successfully consummated.
	Handle client&rsquo;s inquiries via phone calls,emails, live chats, and social media channels.
	Resolve client issues or problems by clarifying the complaint, determining the cause of the problem, and selecting and explaining the best solution to solve the problem. accelerating correction or adjustment; following up to ensure resolution.
	Acquisition of brokers through referral methods from both existing and potential clients.
	Effectively cross-market Rosabon&rsquo;s products to existing and potential clients when the need arises.
	Sourcing for optimal leads can refer customers to do business with us.
	Identify and assess clients needs. to achieve satisfaction
	Managing, supporting, and communicating clients satisfaction levels with regard to Rosabon Financial Services Brokers Products
	Engage clients at the beginning of their subscription; ensure successful take-up and management of fall incidents throughout their transaction phase, from which there might be a risk of dissatisfaction.
	Communicate detailed reports on clients requests and feedback to aid strategic and management decisions.
	Sending status and summary report of the broker&#39;s admin for update on the broker&#39; sportal on a weekly basis
	Any other task as assigned by the line manager


Qualifications /&nbsp;Requirements


	Previous experience working in similar role
	BSC in marketing or any related field of study.


Skills / Competencies:


	Excellent communication skills
	Good negotiation/Sales skills
	Core Competencies in the Use of Microsoft Tools
	Great Interpersonal and Relationship skills


Salary
N120,000 - N170,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to:&nbsp;sales.careers@conceptgroup-ng.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Brokers Sales Executive Job at the Concept Group




        
    

        
        The Concept Group is a holding company for companies established in 1992. Subsidiaries under the Group include: Rosabon Financial Services - Nigeria’s Leading Financial Intermediary and Equipment Leasing Company, Concept Nova - Bespoke Enterprise IT Solutions Company,Percy Aitkins - Bureau De Change.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Brokers Sales Executive

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Brokers Sales executive uses the customer service and marketing functions to nurture leads through the sales funnel, from the addition of leads on the portal down through purchase (and repeat purchases).
	Brokers use various methods to reach clients, including email, phone, social media, direct mail, and even the old-fashioned door-to-door tactic.
	Brokers’ sales executives manage, support, and communicate with clients to ensure all leads are effectively managed and their transactions are successfully consummated.
	They are expected to follow up solely with all leads transferred to them, work on all the stages following the set policy and procedures, and ensure all transactions are successfully consummated.
	They communicate all issues encountered during processing stage and feedback from client to the Head Brokers admin for swift resolution.


Duties & Responsibilities


	Acquisition and retention of brokers and clients through offline marketing
	Aggressively following up with all leads referred by brokers and ensuring successful closure of fall leads
	Handles B2B and B2C leads assigned, following all set procedures and ensuring the transaction is successfully consummated.
	Handle client’s inquiries via phone calls,emails, live chats, and social media channels.
	Resolve client issues or problems by clarifying the complaint, determining the cause of the problem, and selecting and explaining the best solution to solve the problem. accelerating correction or adjustment; following up to ensure resolution.
	Acquisition of brokers through referral methods from both existing and potential clients.
	Effectively cross-market Rosabon’s products to existing and potential clients when the need arises.
	Sourcing for optimal leads can refer customers to do business with us.
	Identify and assess clients needs. to achieve satisfaction
	Managing, supporting, and communicating clients satisfaction levels with regard to Rosabon Financial Services Brokers Products
	Engage clients at the beginning of their subscription; ensure successful take-up and management of fall incidents throughout their transaction phase, from which there might be a risk of dissatisfaction.
	Communicate detailed reports on clients requests and feedback to aid strategic and management decisions.
	Sending status and summary report of the broker's admin for update on the broker' sportal on a weekly basis
	Any other task as assigned by the line manager


Qualifications / Requirements


	Previous experience working in similar role
	BSC in marketing or any related field of study.


Skills / Competencies:


	Excellent communication skills
	Good negotiation/Sales skills
	Core Competencies in the Use of Microsoft Tools
	Great Interpersonal and Relationship skills


Salary
N120,000 - N170,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: sales.careers@conceptgroup-ng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "@context": "https://schema.org",

  "title": "Graphics Designer",
  "description": "Codelabprojects Nigeria Limited is a tech Company offering a range of digital solutions and services tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients. Our services include Web and Mobile Application Development, Business and IT Solutions, Digital Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Website/E-commerce, Branding and Print solutions, among others.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphics Designer

Job Location:&nbsp;Sabon-Lugbe, Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time (On-site)

Job Summary


	We are seeking a talented and creative Graphics Designer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating high-quality visual content that aligns with our brand identity and supports both digital and print needs.


Job Responsibilities


	Design engaging and innovative visual content for marketing materials, social media, websites, advertisements, and presentations.
	Create logos, banners, flyers, brochures, infographics, and other graphic assets for digital and print platforms.
	Collaborate with the marketing and creative teams to ensure designs reflect company branding and messaging.
	Prepare design files for both online and offline use, ensuring high-quality output.
	Maintain and organize design assets for easy retrieval and reuse.
	Stay up to date with industry trends, tools, and best practices in graphic design.
	Manage multiple projects simultaneously and deliver within deadlines.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in any related field.
	Proven experience as a Graphics Designer (portfolio required).
	Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, CorelDRAW, etc.).
	Strong knowledge of design principles, typography, and color theory.
	Excellent attention to detail, creativity, and ability to deliver visually compelling work.
	Strong communication skills and ability to work both independently and in a team.


Salary
N170,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@codelabprojects.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Application Process
Answer the following question:


	Are you comfortable working in an on-site setting?
	We must fill this position urgently. Can you start immediately?
	Are you comfortable with the advertised Salary?
	Where do you stay?


Note:&nbsp;Only candidates living in Abuja (Lugbe, Airport Road, Galadimawa, and its environs) will be considered for this role.",

Graphics Designer Job at CodeLabProjects Group(CLP)




        
    

        
        Codelabprojects Nigeria Limited is a tech Company offering a range of digital solutions and services tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients. Our services include Web and Mobile Application Development, Business and IT Solutions, Digital Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Website/E-commerce, Branding and Print solutions, among others.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphics Designer

Job Location: Sabon-Lugbe, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time (On-site)

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a talented and creative Graphics Designer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating high-quality visual content that aligns with our brand identity and supports both digital and print needs.


Job Responsibilities


	Design engaging and innovative visual content for marketing materials, social media, websites, advertisements, and presentations.
	Create logos, banners, flyers, brochures, infographics, and other graphic assets for digital and print platforms.
	Collaborate with the marketing and creative teams to ensure designs reflect company branding and messaging.
	Prepare design files for both online and offline use, ensuring high-quality output.
	Maintain and organize design assets for easy retrieval and reuse.
	Stay up to date with industry trends, tools, and best practices in graphic design.
	Manage multiple projects simultaneously and deliver within deadlines.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in any related field.
	Proven experience as a Graphics Designer (portfolio required).
	Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, CorelDRAW, etc.).
	Strong knowledge of design principles, typography, and color theory.
	Excellent attention to detail, creativity, and ability to deliver visually compelling work.
	Strong communication skills and ability to work both independently and in a team.


Salary
N170,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@codelabprojects.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Application Process
Answer the following question:


	Are you comfortable working in an on-site setting?
	We must fill this position urgently. Can you start immediately?
	Are you comfortable with the advertised Salary?
	Where do you stay?


Note: Only candidates living in Abuja (Lugbe, Airport Road, Galadimawa, and its environs) will be considered for this role.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Store Manager",
  "description": "Codelabprojects Nigeria Limited is a tech Company offering a range of digital solutions and services tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients. Our services include Web and Mobile Application Development, Business and IT Solutions, Digital Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Website/E-commerce, Branding and Print solutions, among others.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Store Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Warri, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a proactive and organized Store Manager to oversee and manage the daily operations of our store/stock.
	The ideal candidate will ensure efficient inventory management, smooth workflow, accurate record-keeping, and compliance with company policies.


Job Responsibilities


	Oversee day-to-day store operations and ensure smooth functioning.
	Manage inventory levels by tracking, recording, and reconciling stock in and out.
	Supervise loading and offloading of items, ensuring accuracy and accountability.
	Maintain organized and up-to-date stock records.
	Monitor store security, cleanliness, and proper handling of materials.
	Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly reports on stock movement and store performance.
	Coordinate with procurement and operations teams to ensure timely supply of materials.
	Train and supervise store staff (if applicable).
	Enforce compliance with company policies, procedures, and safety standards.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management, or any related field.
	2 years of proven experience as a Store Manager, Inventory Officer, or in a similar role.
	Strong knowledge of inventory control and storekeeping practices.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word) and basic inventory management software.
	Excellent organizational, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
	Strong attention to detail and ability to work independently.
	Good communication and leadership skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@codelabprojects.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Application Process
Answer the following question:
1. How many years of experience do you have?
2. Where are you located?

Note


	This is a fully on-site role
	Only candidates living in Delta (Warri&nbsp;and its environs) will be considered for this role.

Store Manager Job at Codelabprojects  Group(CLP)




        
    

        
        Codelabprojects Nigeria Limited is a tech Company offering a range of digital solutions and services tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients. Our services include Web and Mobile Application Development, Business and IT Solutions, Digital Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Website/E-commerce, Branding and Print solutions, among others.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Store Manager

Job Location: Warri, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a proactive and organized Store Manager to oversee and manage the daily operations of our store/stock.
	The ideal candidate will ensure efficient inventory management, smooth workflow, accurate record-keeping, and compliance with company policies.


Job Responsibilities


	Oversee day-to-day store operations and ensure smooth functioning.
	Manage inventory levels by tracking, recording, and reconciling stock in and out.
	Supervise loading and offloading of items, ensuring accuracy and accountability.
	Maintain organized and up-to-date stock records.
	Monitor store security, cleanliness, and proper handling of materials.
	Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly reports on stock movement and store performance.
	Coordinate with procurement and operations teams to ensure timely supply of materials.
	Train and supervise store staff (if applicable).
	Enforce compliance with company policies, procedures, and safety standards.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management, or any related field.
	2 years of proven experience as a Store Manager, Inventory Officer, or in a similar role.
	Strong knowledge of inventory control and storekeeping practices.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word) and basic inventory management software.
	Excellent organizational, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
	Strong attention to detail and ability to work independently.
	Good communication and leadership skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@codelabprojects.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Application Process
Answer the following question:
1. How many years of experience do you have?
2. Where are you located?

Note


	This is a fully on-site role
	Only candidates living in Delta (Warri and its environs) will be considered for this role.
